meanings.def: one of two children born at the same time to the same mother
examples: If you're carrying (= expecting) twins or triplets, that can put you at risk.
His long-lost twin was searching for him.
The twins were separated at birth.
adult twins who were raised apart
the plot device of giving a character an evil twin

meanings.def: one of two similar things that make a pair
examples: The plate was one of a pair but I broke its twin.

meanings.def: used to describe one of a pair of children who are twins
used to describe two things that are used as a pair
used to describe two things that are connected, or present or happening at the same time
examples: The prison service has the twin goals of punishment and rehabilitation.

meanings.def: to make a close relationship between two towns or areas
examples: Oxford is twinned with Bonn in Germany.

meanings.def: to join two people or things closely together
examples: The opera twins the themes of love and death.
